Title: Dynamic reciprocity revisited
Abstract: © 2015 Elsevier Ltd.The cellular microenvironment - which includes the cells, extracellular matrix (ECM), and local transport processes - affects the cell which in turn responds by synthetic or degradative processes causing the composition and the structure of ECM, and the local transport processes, to change which in a coupled manner influence the cell, and so forth.
